content: There she is!!! I’ve been hoping you’d come back, Randy!! Good to see you here and, thank you so much for your per usual thoughtful and sweet comment. I was trying to get a bit of a snarky juxtaposition going between the title and the piece, like here is how my goofy dog behaves when she’s not eating cat poop. What does that say about us? Not sure it landed! Ha! 🎉😂 but it’s true anyway. She’s the best furry. ❤❤
